articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: While still saying he is "entitled to personal attacks", Donald Trump seeks to shift his campaign focus to policy.
articles.title: A different kind of Trump goes on display

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: At 37, she will be the country's youngest PM and the second woman in the post, after her aunt Yingluck.
articles.title: Thailand picks Thaksin's daughter Paetongtarn as new PM

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A year-long investigation uncovered a vast ketamine dealing network, cover up attempts, another death, and led to five arrests - including doctors and a dealer who was known locally as "The Ketamine Queen".
articles.title: Matthew Perry death investigation: An underground drug network

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Friends actor was found in LA home last year with high levels of ketamine in his system
articles.title: Matthew Perry: Arrest reported over death of Friends actor

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: China wants people to report Taiwanese "separatists", with the threat of death penalties for some.
articles.title: China's rhetoric turns dangerously real for Taiwanese

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The way US weapons are used in the war keeps changing - US officials are assessing how Putin might react.
articles.title: Ukraine's surprise advance into Russia a risk for Biden

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Once common on tickets and cardkeys the magnetic stripe is being phased out.
articles.title: Is this the end for the magnetic stripe?

articles.description: The Palestinian health ministry says one man was killed and another was critically injured
articles.title: Israeli settlers torch Palestinian village in West Bank

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The internet entrepreneur faces several criminal charges in the US, including copyright infringement.
articles.title: Kim Dotcom to be extradited from New Zealand to the US

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Detroit judge condemned by mother after showing 15-year-old he was "not to be played with".
articles.title: US judge suspended for handcuffing girl for sleeping during field trip
